question.title: Android Gradle Error: Could Not Resolve com.kaopiz
question.body:
Execution failed for task ':app:checkDebugAarMetadata'.
> Could not resolve all files for configuration ':app:debugRuntimeClasspath'.
   > Could not find com.kaopiz:kprogresshud:1.2.0.

build.gradle

dependencies {
        implementation 'com.kaopiz:kprogresshud:1.2.0'
        // Other dependencies
    }

I have tried using alternative versions from the same repository, such as:

// implementation 'com.github.kaopiz:KProgressHUD:1.0.0'
// implementation 'com.github.Kaopiz:KProgressHUD:v1.2.0'

However, none of these attempts have resolved the issue. My allprojects repositories are configured as follows:

allprojects {
    repositories {
        google()
        mavenCentral()
        maven { url 'https://jitpack.io' }
        maven { url 'https://github.com/uPhyca/stetho-realm/raw/master/maven-repo' }
    }
}

What might be going wrong, and how to correctly include the com.kaopiz:kprogresshud or a working version of KProgressHUD in my project?
